shortBio: Karmant stands at the frontlines of Bangladesh Thrash Metal!
longBio:
Karmant is an independent thrash metal band from Dhaka, Bangladesh, formed in 2016. Active in the underground metal scene, the band is known for delivering raw, uncompromising thrash metal with an aggressive and direct approach.

In April 2021, Karmant released their debut EP, Riot in Uniform, featuring the tracks Nuclear Outbreak, Riot in Uniform, Greed, and General Destroyer.

The band has performed extensively across Bangladesh and has completed two international live performances. As part of their current phase, Karmant has released two demo tracks from their upcoming full-length album, Hack & Slash, and is actively working toward its official release.
